name: Danang_Summer heaven
description: Danang: one of the most development city in Vietnam and were called the most livable city there. I insist you will have a great summer in Danang: with beautiful beach My Khe, majestic Son Tra mountain, sparkling Han river at night and many special traditional foods: My Quang, Banh trang...You can also join the old culture in Hoi An: how people live, how people work, Bai choi games, Japanese bridge...Specially, you can fell the fresh air in Dong Giang tea hills, know about ethnic minorities there...and lots of interesting place welcome you. So if you want to have a memorable summer_Visit Danang and join with me.
